interpretation: The Mechanical Arm card represents strength, power, and control. This card suggests that you have the ability to overcome any obstacle in your path with determination and force. You have the power to take charge of any situation and make things happen. However, be cautious not to let your strength and control lead to aggression or domination over others. This card also reminds you to take care of your physical health and well-being, as the mechanical arm symbolizes the importance of maintaining strong and functional body parts. Overall, this card encourages you to embrace your inner strength and use it to your advantage in all aspects of your life.
